title: Optimising biomass conversion on Miscanthus for bioenergy and industrial materials
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The outputs/findings will not be available until 31 May 2015.
findingsText: Recently award project and the project is expected to finish 31 May 2015. The partnering award will create international synergy to collaborate in the area of bioenergy research. Data from the collaboration can be shared and further integrated and analysed. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Energy
